data.title: Marketing Manager, Author at Hotel Julien Dubuque
data.meta_description: Hotel Julien Dubuque is an elegant boutique hotel that marries modern amenities with historic charm in the heart of the Old Main District.
data.text:
Meet the Team: James Jones

August 14, 2024

Name: James Jones

Title: Caroline’s Restaurant Supervisor

Hometown: Dubuque, Iowa

How long have you been with Caroline’s Restaurant?

I worked at Caroline’s for 3 years during high school but came back in March of this year.

What path brought you to Caroline’s Restaurant? Please share a little bit about your professional background and what led you to this industry.

I have always enjoyed the service industry. I returned to Caroline’s after some time away so it holds a special spot in my heart.

What are you most passionate about professionally?

I am passionate about serving guests delicious food and giving them a great experience.

What are you passionate about personally?

I love hanging out with friends and family. I also enjoy creating content.

What are some of your favorite things to do in the Dubuque area?

I love visiting all of the historic landmarks.

What do you love most about Hotel Julien Dubuque?

I love the rich history and awesome people I get to work with.

Meet the Team: Matthew Campbell-Nollen

May 8, 2024

Name: Matthew Campbell-Nollen

Title: Beverage Manager

Hometown: Galena, Illinois

How long have you been with Hotel Julien Dubuque?

Almost 5 months

What path brought you to Hotel Julien Dubuque? Please share a little bit about your professional background and what led you to this industry.

I was in the Army for 12 years. After that, I ran several restaurants and bars. Also, I was the Manager of the cage department at a couple of casinos. My last job was at Chestnut Mountain Resort as the Night Manager.

What are you most passionate about professionally?

I am most passionate about taking care of my staff and our guests.

What are you passionate about personally?

I am very passionate about art. I use multiple types of media such as oils, acrylic, and also tattooing.

What is your favorite way to spend a free weekend?

I enjoy spending time with my spouse and our dog when I have free time.

What are some of your favorite things to do in the Dubuque area?

I haven’t spent a lot of time in Dubuque, though the casinos are always entertaining.

What do you love most about Hotel Julien Dubuque?

I like how the staff all get along and help each other.

What is your personal motto?

“Work Hard, Play Hard”

Describe your typical work day.

Every day is different for me. I may be focused on an event, day-to-day operations of Riverboat Lounge, working on drink menus, scheduling staff, or doing paperwork.

Please share a go-to fun fact about yourself.

I hinted at it earlier, but I like to do tattoos. I have done 125 tattoos so far, and look forward to doing more. I design tattoos, but can also stencil if a person wants something particular.
